Home.title: PICME: SEO IMAGE OPTIMIZER
Home.loadingDescription: Please wait while we initialize image processing capabilities.
Home.privacyDescription: PICME processes all images directly in your browser. We don't store your photos or data on our servers.

presets.title: PROFESSIONAL PRESETS
presets.description: Apply optimized presets for e-commerce, social media, and web display with a single click.

aiPowered.title: AI-POWERED SEO
aiPowered.description: Generate SEO-friendly filenames with our AI tools to improve your product discoverability.

advancedControls.title: ADVANCED CONTROLS
advancedControls.description: Fine-tune brightness, contrast, white balance, and more to perfect your product images.

batchProcessing.title: BATCH PROCESSING
batchProcessing.description: Process multiple images at once to save time and ensure consistent results.

Home.proDescription: Process up to {maxImages} images at once with all premium features unlocked.
Home.freeDescription: Limited to {maxImages} images. Upgrade to PRO to process up to 100 images at once.

Layout.title: PicMe - SEO-Friendly Image Optimizer
Layout.description: Optimize your product images for SEO with simple adjustments to white balance, contrast, and size.
Layout.keywords: image optimization, SEO images, product photos, white balance, image batch processing

BackgroundRemoval.title: BACKGROUND REMOVAL
BackgroundRemoval.description: Remove the background from your product image with AI technology. The process occurs entirely in your browser for privacy.

proDialog.title: UPGRADE TO PRO
proDialog.description: Upgrade to PRO to unlock background removal for all your images (up to 100 at once)! Get professional-looking product photos with transparent backgrounds.

BackgroundRemoval.compactDescription: Removes background from product images using AI. Processing takes 10-30 seconds.

web-optimized.name: Web Optimized
web-optimized.description: 1080px, 75% quality (Smallest file size, good for web)

appliedNames.title: Applied SEO Names
appliedNames.description: Our AI has generated SEO-optimized filenames for your images. You can edit individual names in the image preview section.

Pricing.title: PRICING PLANS
Pricing.subtitle: Choose the perfect plan for your image optimization needs. Our PRO plan offers a lifetime license with a one-time payment.

alreadyPro.title: You're already a PRO user!
alreadyPro.description: Thank you for your support. You have access to all PRO features including bulk background removal, advanced image adjustments, and SEO filename generation.

checkout.title: COMPLETE YOUR PURCHASE
checkout.description: One-time payment, lifetime access to all PRO features

free.title: FREE
features: Process up to 10 images at once

pro.title: PRO
features: Process up to 100 images at once

oneTime.question: Is this really a one-time payment?
oneTime.answer: Yes! Pay once and get lifetime access to all PRO features. No recurring subscriptions.

backgroundRemoval.question: How does background removal work?
backgroundRemoval.answer: We use advanced AI algorithms to detect and remove backgrounds from your product images. The entire process happens in your browser - we never store your images on our servers.

imageLimits.question: What are the image limits?
imageLimits.answer: Free users can process up to 10 images at once with basic features and remove the background from 1 image at a time. PRO users can process up to 100 images simultaneously, including bulk background removal.

refund.question: Can I request a refund?
refund.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee if you're not satisfied with the PRO features. Contact our support team for assistance.
